name: Hot Springs National Park
description: Pressed penny machine located near Bathhouse Row, featuring designs related to the park's history and thermal springs.

name: Razorback White Oak Travel Center
description: Pressed penny set available at the travel center, showcasing designs inspired by the Razorback mascot and local landmarks.

name: Arkansas Diamond Mine
description: Pressed penny machine located at the Crater of Diamonds State Park, featuring designs related to diamond mining and geology.

name: Little Rock Zoo
description: Pressed penny machine located near the zoo entrance, offering designs featuring various animal species.

name: Eureka Springs & North Arkansas Railway
description: Pressed penny machine available at the railway station, featuring designs related to the historic train and local scenery.
